thread.section_title: The Surrey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: nice hotel
thread.title_full: nice hotel - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: watkinsmarie
title: nice hotel
text:
The Surrey is located in the Upper East side in a residential area close to Central Park, restaurants and shops. Boutique style with spacious tastefully done rooms . Bathroom was spacious , with rain-shower and quality amenities. The staff is professional and friendly. Breakfast at Cafe Boulud is very good and they also serve lunch and dinner.
There is also a seasonal rooftop bar with nice views of the city.
